name: AuthorizeUserToolAccess
description:
Authorize a user to access a specific tool.

This tool authorizes a user for a specific tool by its name. It should be called when a user needs permission to access a specific tool. The tool returns the authorization status.

parameters.name: tool_name_for_authorization
parameters.description: Specify the name of the tool to authorize the user for access.

parameters.name: redirect_uri_after_authorization
parameters.description: Optional URI to redirect the user after authorization.

value_schema.description: Optional: if provided, the user will be redirected to this URI after authorization

parameters.name: tool_version
parameters.description: Specify the tool version to authorize. If not provided, any version will be used.

value_schema.description: Optional: if not provided, any version is used

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for a user. Required only when using an API key for authorization.

value_schema.description: Required only when calling with an API key
